PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryCornerFixingPlate
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties specific to corner fixing plates.

PropertyDef.Name: CornerFixingPlateLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of the L-shaped corner plate.

PropertyDef.Name: CornerFixingPlateThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the L-shaped corner plate.

PropertyDef.Name: CornerFixingPlateFlangeWidthInPlaneZ
PropertyDef.Definition: The flange width of the L-shaped corner plate in plane Z.

PropertyDef.Name: CornerFixingPlateFlangeWidthInPlaneX
PropertyDef.Definition: The flange width of the L-shaped corner plate in plane X.
